title: "Goin' to sleep means sayin' goodbye..."
body:
That line hits me right in the feels :(

Bravo to whoever wrote Galio's lines, it's nice that he's a goofy character with a serious side.

And kudos to his actor too, of course.

replies.body: JohnODyin was the narrative writer on Galio. He also did Poppy, Ryze and Yorick VGUs. He's currently working on the Evelynn VGU :)

i wish Sona's lines were as good as the lines he did

:(

no pls stop, sona's voice is the best part of the champ

Good job in general with all these VGU's they seem to be flying off the shelf (look how far Urgot already is). I really love this pace

Keep up the great work rito{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Yeah. I love Galio because of the depth and how he realistically portrays someone who's depressed. Remember, few depressed people actually spend all their time going on about how sad they are, they usually hide it behind another way of behaving. Like the class clown.
The voice actor for new Galio is Josh Petersdorf, the same man who voices Roadhog in Overwatch.

I'd like to think that's a reference to the old Galio. The one that has been permanently put to sleep to be replaced by this new champion.
Goodnight Galio, sleep well.

Oh hello new champion, Galio's asleep now- I suppose you can take his name now!
